data.title: The Juilliard School
data.meta_description: Don’t have your Alumni ID card? Email alumni@juilliard.edu with your degree and contact information or call (212) 799-5000, ext. 344.
data.text:
Juilliard Performance Tickets

All college and pre-college division alumni who completed their degree at Juilliard (New York and Tianjin campuses) are eligible to purchase discounted tickets to Juilliard performances (valued at $30 or more) for 50 percent off, depending on availability. Tickets become available to the Juilliard community on the first day of sale to the general public. For more information on how to utilize your discount for Juilliard performance tickets, visit the box office’s FAQ page.

Tickets for Juilliard performances at Alice Tully, David Geffen, and Carnegie halls are not available at the Juilliard box office; those tickets may be obtained at each venue—contact [email protected] for the discount code, which will likely be needed whether purchasing tickets online or in-person. Online fees will apply.

Trouble with your account? Reach out to [email protected] for assistance
